InsideBrazilianMmaJungleFights:ScoutingU.name: Inside Brazilian MMA Jungle Fights: Scouting UFC's Future Stars |Doc of the Day
InsideBrazilianMmaJungleFights:ScoutingU.summary: An inside look at the violent world of Brazilian MMA Jungle Fights, where founder/promoter Wallid Ismail stages events in the wilds of the country looking for the next stars that will fight in the UFC in the United States.

ThugRose:MixedMartialArtist.name: THUG Rose: Mixed Martial Artist
ThugRose:MixedMartialArtist.summary: This 90-minute documentary film reveals the dramatic and inspiring story of one of the most fascinating personalities in the fight business, 2-time former UFC strawweight champ “Thug Rose” Namajunas.

UfcMixedMartialArtsDocumentary.name: UFC Mixed Martial Arts   Documentary
UfcMixedMartialArtsDocumentary.summary: The Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) is a mixed martial arts promotion company. It is the largest in the world and features most of the top-ranked fighters in the sport. Based in the United States, the UFC produces events worldwide  that showcase ten weight divisions and abide by the Unified Rules of Mixed Martial Arts. The UFC has held over 300 events to date. Dana White serves as the president of the UFC while brothers Frank and Lorenzo Fertitta control the UFC's parent company, Zuffa, LLC. The first Ultimate Fighting Championship event was held on November 12, 1993 at the McNichols Sports Arena in Denver, Colorado] The purpose of the early Ultimate Fighting Championship competitions were to identify the most effective martial art in a fight, with minimal rules, between competitors of different fighting disciplines, including boxing, Brazilian jiu-jitsu, Sambo, wrestling, Muay Thai, karate, judo, and other styles. In subsequent competitions, fighters began adopting effective techniques from more than one discipline, which indirectly helped create an entirely separate style of fighting known as present-day mixed martial arts. Please note we do not own this video, sharing for information purposes only.
